parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table; 0-based index

parameters.name: ItemNumber
parameters.description: Item number for the specified BOM table row

parameters.name: PartNumber
parameters.description: Part number for the specified BOM table row

title: IBomTableAnnotation.GetModelPathNames
description: Gets the full pathnames of all documents in the specified row of this BOM table annotation. Also gets the item and part numbers associated with the specified row.
signature:
System.Object GetModelPathNames( 
   System.Int32
RowIndex
,
   out System.String
ItemNumber
,
   out System.String
PartNumber
)

parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table; 0-based index

parameters.name: ItemNumber
parameters.description: Item number for the specified BOM table row

parameters.name: PartNumber
parameters.description: Part number for the specified BOM table row

returns: Array of full pathnames of the models in the specified BOM table row
